actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax any pension or annuity received under a public retirement system.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income amounts received by an individual as a pension, annuity, or similar retirement benefit under a public retirement system. Makes technical and conforming amendments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from income tax any pension or annuity received under a public retirement system.
